name: C.A.B.L.E.S.S.
description:
Play as an AI onboard a spaceship and try to keep your crew members and the spaceship safe and sound in order to reach a new inhabitable planet.

(WebGL version is unplayable)

Character artist & script writer: kalearts94

Real time event for hacking: Fabian Zimmermann

Main Programmer & level designer: CastelliA
